sentences.en: A sufficiently energetic particle can penetrate the entire stack of parallel plates.
sentences.cn: 能量充足的粒子能够穿透全部平行板.

sentences.en: bullets that penetrate thick armour plating
By sheer force of will, he could penetrate it.
sentences.cn: 他全仗意志的力量就可以发现那里的秘密.

sentences.en: He felt some of the snow slide in, penetrate his shirt.
sentences.cn: 他感到有些雪片溜进大衣, 透过衬衫.

sentences.en: He strained his eyes to penetrate beyond the thick cloud of dust.
sentences.cn: 他竭力想透过尘埃看清那边的东西.

sentences.en: Only micronic particulates penetrate to the depth of the lung.
sentences.cn: 只有微细粒子穿透到肺深部.

sentences.en: She could penetrate what I was thinking.
Sunlight barely penetrated the dirty windows.
sentences.cn: 阳光几乎照不进那些肮脏的窗户。

sentences.en: The army was one of the few institutions the secret police were not encouraged to penetrate.
sentences.cn: 军队是不鼓励秘密警察渗入的少数机构之一。

sentences.en: The drugs industry is complex and hard to penetrate.
sentences.cn: 医药行业非常复杂，很难进入。

sentences.en: The police were unable to penetrate the wiles of the cat burglar.
sentences.cn: 警方无法识破窃贼的诡计.

sentences.en: The sunshine could not penetrate where the trees were thickest.
sentences.cn: 阳光不能透入树木最浓密的地方.

sentences.en: There have been around 15 attempts from outside France to penetrate the market.
sentences.cn: 大约已经有15家外国公司试图进入法国市场。

sentences.en: This method of cooking also permits heat to penetrate evenly from both sides.
sentences.cn: 这种烹饪方法也能使两面均匀受热。

sentences.en: Those who love nature always desire to penetrate into its utmost recesses.
sentences.cn: 喜爱大自然的人总想深入到最幽静之处.

sentences.en: We can see the wasp to penetrate glass.
sentences.cn: 透过玻璃我们可以看到黄蜂.
X射线能够穿透很多物体。

words.tran_cn: 渗透的；尖锐的；有洞察力的

trans.tran_en: to enter something and pass or spread through it, especially when this is difficult

trans.tran_cn: 穿透，穿过，进入，渗入，洞悉
trans.tran_en: to enter something and pass or spread through it, especially when this is difficult

trans.tran_cn: 穿透，刺入，渗入，秘密潜入，洞悉，明了
trans.tran_en: to enter something and pass or spread through it, especially when this is difficult
